data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Marco Rente blunders with an own goal. This makes it 0-1.
In the minute 34, George Cox is booked for the away team.
Erwin Blank blows to end the first-half.
Mats Seuntjens (Sittard) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 46, The second-half has started.
Frank Wormuth (Almelo) is making a first substitution, with Delano Burgzorg replacing Marco Rente.
The home team have replaced Lucas Schoofs with Teun Bijleveld. This is the second substitution made today by Frank Wormuth.
In the minute 52, Lazaros Rota (Sittard) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Delano Burgzorg (Almelo) has received a first yellow card.
Goal! Sittard extend their lead to 0-2 through Sebastian Polter.
In the minute 60, Emil Hansson instrumental with a fine assist.
Silvester Van der Water is on a sub for Orestis Kiomourtzoglou for Almelo.
Sjors Ultee is making the team's first substitution at Erve Asito with Branislav Ninaj replacing Lazaros Rota.
In the minute 76, At Erve Asito, Yanick Van Osch has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Kasper Lunding is replacing Adrian Szoke for Almelo at Erve Asito.
Sjors Ultee (Sittard) has taken off Mats Seuntjens who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Nassim El Ablak is the replacement.
In the minute 81, Sittard make their third substitution with Djibril Dianessy replacing Lisandro Semedo.
The match has come to a close in Almelo. The final score is 1-2.
Mike van Beijnen is replacing Emil Hansson for the away team.
Goal! The home team reduce the deficit to 1-2 through a header from Delano Burgzorg.
That's a fine assist from Rai Vloet.
